Sentence: Why it is necessary to upload their videos for showing what they did if they want to make a donation.

Langger village in Keriya was the first stop for them and they visited 220 affected families.

This letter was written on Feb 18th, 2014 in Kiriye Maripet Bookstore.
Everybody regardless where they are from prepared with all their power and departed to the affected area.
